title: Tasty Recipes
content: Complete meals at an affordable price for you and your family

title: Zero Plastic, Zero Waste!
content: We only supply our local community, eliminating the need for irritating single-use plastic packaging

title: Organic ONLY
content: The best produce and meat available.  Organic and locally sourced as much as possible

title: Time Saving
content: All meals are prepared and ready to heat and eat in minutes

title: Community Driven
content: We live in and support our community through donating a percentage of profits to the Missoula Food Bank.
